title: Bird safari in Australia
creator_credit: Jenny Erdos, Laszlo Erdos and David Cook
brief_description: Filmed entirely on location in the Mallee type country of Southern Australia, this film explores the paradise that is shared by birds, plants and insects in their natural environment. Features wonderful close-ups of undisturbed wildlife while the background music is a beautiful symphony of bird songs and calls. Narrated by Fred Parslow.
